channel.title: Chapelizod Cricket Club
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Chapelizod Cricket Club

item.title: 2017 Season Awards üèÜ
item.description:
Our final event of 2017 was the Awards night held upstairs in the Villager, Chapelizod. All in all we played 18 matches: 9 victories, 8 losses and a draw. The enthusiasm in our first full season was fantastic from the players, friends and locals.

We will continue this tradition bigger and better in 2018 and hope to see you there!

The winners from 2017 are as follows:

Catch of the year

Mahesh

Bowler of the year

Renato De Silva

Newcomer of the year

Colm Massey

Batsman of the year

Hariprasad Govindarajan

Player of the year

Greg Murray

Our final event of 2017 was the Awards night held upstairs in the Villager, Chapelizod. All in all we played 18 matches: 9 victories, 8 losses and a draw. The enthusiasm in our first full season was fantastic from the players, friends and locals.
